sentence.Network_en: Her views are ( an ) anathema to me.
They launched a fresh anathema against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们又发起了把他赶出教门的运动.

list.exp: 诅咒 咒骂 厌恶
list.abs: anarchism 无政府主义anarchist anathema 诅咒咒骂厌恶anathematize anatomy 剖析解剖
Racial prejudice is anathema to me ., 我对种族偏见深恶痛绝.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin, excommunicated person, excommunication', from Greek anathema 'thing dedicated', (later) 'thing devoted to evil, accursed thing', from anatithenai 'to set up'

entry.def: If something is anathema to you, you strongly dislike it.

means.word_mean: 2. a formal ecclesiastical curse accompanied by excommunication
